title: @Riot, can we please have Normal Draft back?
body:
1. Normal Draft allowed Teams to practice without impacting their Ranked Record.
2. Normal Draft was replaced by Team Builder - a monumental flop if ever I've seen one.
3. It puts you in the position of either having to play Ranked, or put up with whatever absurdly strong Champion Riot most recently broke in Blind Pick.

replies.body: They've answered it a million times. Don't waste your time.

No they keep avoiding the actual points.

the biggest point is this, how is it that we can't have normal draft, if we can have TB with queues 3 times as long on peak compared to draft's off peak time. (off peak for draft was 10 minute queues roughly, TB is 30 minutes+ during peak hours.)
I'm not gonna argue. Believe what ever you want.
I agree, team builder is dead content and I would much prefer normal draft.
